sql.sql: select s.BUSINESSCONTENT ,s.pzhm from zm_wspzhkxx h,zm_sswszmkjxx s WHERE h.kjsswszmuuid=s.kjsswszmuuid and h.kjsswszmuuid in (#macroparam#)

select m.BYDJUUID, m.WCJYZMUUID, m.DJXH, m.LCSLID, m.WCJYHDSSGLZMBH, m.SWDJD, m.WCJYD, m.WCJYHTZJE, m.SWDJDSWJGYJ, m.WCJYDSWJGYJ, m.WCJYHDSSGLZMYXQXQ, m.WCJYHDSSGLZMYXQXZ, m.WCJYHDSSGLZMQFRQ, m.BSRXM, m.LXDH, m.SQRQ, m.BYSJ, m.SBLCSLID, m.YWCJYHDSSGLZMBH, m.JYFSDMJH, m.SCJYDSWJGMC, m.SCJYDSWJGLXDH, m.JGSZDQYSDSZSFS_DM, m.JGSZDQYSDSHSJGMC, m.JGSZDQYSDSHSJG_DM, m.ZFBZ_1, m.ZFRQ_1, m.ZFR_DM, m.YXBZ from dj_wbnsrjydbydj m, dj_ls_djxhshxydm a where m.wcjyhdssglzmbh = a.xh_2 and m.yxbz = 'Y' and (m.zfbz_1 = 'N' OR M.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL)

select uuid, djxh, pzzl_dm, pzzg, pzhm, businesscontent, zfbz_1, zfrq_1, zfr_dm, lrrq, lrr_dm, bkbz kjsswszmuuid from zm_sswszmkjxx z where z.kjsswszmuuid = ? and z.pzzl_dm = ? and z.pzzg = ? and z.pzhm = ? and z.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select t.djxh, t.jzygcxmuuid, t.gcxmbh, t.gcxmmc, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.ZDXMBZ, n.wcjyhdssglzmbh, n.wcjyhdssglzmyxqxz as zmyxqxz from dj_wbnsrjydbydj n, ( select b.djxh, a.jzygcxmuuid, b.gcxmbh, b.gcxmmc, b.zgswskfj_dm, b.ZDXMBZ, a.wcjyhdssglzmbh from DJ_JZYXMDJ_WCJYHDSSGLZMXX a, DJ_JZYGCXMQKDJXXB b where a.jzygcxmuuid = b.jzygcxmuuid and (a.djxh = ? OR 1 = #macroparam#) ) t where n.djxh = t.djxh(+) and n.wcjyhdssglzmbh = t.wcjyhdssglzmbh(+) and (n.wcjyhdssglzmbh = ? OR 1=#macroparam#)

SELECT WCJYZMUUID, DJXH, LCSLID, WCJYDXZQHSZ_DM, WCJYD, SWJGJG, ZG, NH, WH, BYLCSLID, WCJYHDSSGLZMBH, SWDJD, SWDJDSWJGYJ, YWCJYHDSSGLZMBH, JYFSDMJH, JDXZ_DM, SWJGJBRXM, SWJGJBRQZRQ, SWJGFZRXM, SWJGFZRQZRQ, WSZZRQ, ZMYXQXQ, ZMYXQXZ, WCJYHTZJE, HXRQ, HXLCSLID, BYRQ, YWPZUUID, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, HTDFNSRSBH, HTDFNSRMC FROM zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx zm WHERE DJXH = ? AND HXRQ IS NULL AND ZFBZ_1 = ? AND zm.yxbz = ?
select t.uuid, t.djxh, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg, t.pzhm, t.zfbz_1, t.bkbz, t.ypzzl_dm, t.ypzzg, t.ypzhm from zm_sswszmkjxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.pzzl_dm = ? and t.pzzg = ? and t.pzhm = ?

select t.uuid, t.djxh, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg, t.pzhm, t.businesscontent, t.zfbz_1, t.je, t.bkbz, t.ypzzl_dm, t.ypzzg, t.ypzhm, t.clsbdm, t.kjsswszmuuid from zm_sswszmkjxx t where t.pzzl_dm = ? and t.pzzg = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.pzhm between ? and ?

SELECT KJSSWSZMUUID,DJXH,LCSLID,NSPZHKZL_DM,KJSSWSZMYY_DM,HZKJQQ,HZKJQZ,DZDSRHKJYWRDJXH, PZZL_DM,PZZG,PZQSHM,PZZZHM,DQSYPZHM,HJJE,SBUUID,SQLY,SBFBZ,DKDJBZ,ZFBZ_1,TFRQ,TFR_DM, YWPZUUID,LRR_DM,LRRQ,XGR_DM,XGRQ,SJGSDQ,DZSPHM FROM zm_wspzhkxx WHERE nsrsbh = ? AND nsrmc = ? AND pzzl_dm = ? AND pzzg = ? AND pzqshm <= ? AND pzzzhm >= ? AND zfbz_1 = 'N'
select nsrmc ,djxh from zm_wspzhkxx z where z.nsrsbh = ?

select t.uuid, t.djxh, t.sbhm, t.fhrq_1, t.zzjg_dm, t.shxyDm, t.jgmc_1, t.sfzjhm, t.fkrxm_1, t.jybm, t.hbsz_dm, t.fhje, t.fhjezmy, t.skrgjhdqsz_dm, t.skrxm, t.jyfy, t.fhyhsswhjmc, t.fxd, t.sfycbz, t.ycyy, t.bjskbz, t.bz, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.sjgsdq from ZM_DWFHDZSJYCXXHCB t where t.djxh = ?
select t.kjsswszmuuid,t.dzsphm from zm_wspzhkxx t where t.kjsswszmuuid = ?

select t.uuid, t.djxh, t.fybh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.sqrq, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.dyrq, t.yxbz, t.zfbz_1 from zm_yjssswszmxxb t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.fybh = ?) and t.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select t.uuid, t.kjsswszmuuid, t.djxh, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg, t.pzhm, t.businesscontent, t.je, t.bkbz, t.ypzzl_dm, t.ypzzg, t.ypzhm, t.clsbdm from zm_sswszmkjxx t where t.kjsswszmuuid = ? and t.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select t.kjsswszmuuid, t.djxh, t.lcslid, t.nspzhkzl_dm, t.kjsswszmyy_dm, t.hzkjqq, t.hzkjqz, t.dzdsrhkjywrdjxh, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg, t.pzqshm, t.pzzzhm, t.dqsypzhm, t.hjje, t.zfbz_1, t.dkdjbz, t.tfrq, t.dzsphm from zm_wspzhkxx t where t.dzsphm in (#macroparam#) and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and t.kjsswszmyy_dm = ?

with lsje as (select a.djxh, sum(a.kpje) kpje, sum(dksqje) dksqje from fp_dk_sq a, fp_ls_yjjecxtj b where a.djxh = b.djxh and a.lrrq >= b.kpqsrq and a.lrrq <= b.kpjzrq and a.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.zsbz = 'Y' group by a.djxh) select c.djxh, c.kpqsrq, c.kpjzrq, ls.kpje, ls.dksqje from fp_ls_yjjecxtj c, lsje ls where c.djxh = ls.djxh

select z.zyssquuid, z.wszg, z.kjzl_dm, z.ghdwmc, z.yscpmc, z.zmyxqxq, z.zmyxqxz, z.dwse, z.ynse, z.sdqzm, z.businesscontent from zm_zysglzm z where z.djxh = ? and z.kjzl_dm = ? and z.zmyxqxq > = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and z.zmyxqxz < = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and z.zfbz_1 = 'N'

select t.uuid, t.ydzgswjg_dm, t.ydzgswjgmc, t.mbdswjg_dm, t.ydxzqhsz_dm, t.mbdxzqhsz_dm, t.sdzt, t.xxzt, t.qddm, t.lb_dm, t.ssbzj, t.yddjxh, t.mbddjxh, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.bwnr, t.fhbwnr, t.yxbz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, ksfwxxid from zm_wcjyhdssglzmxx z, gy_ksfwxx_rzb t where z.wcjyhdssglzmbh = t.ssbzj and z.wcjyzmuuid = ? and t.lb_dm = ? and z.yxbz = ? and t.yxbz = ?
select distinct t.zgswskfj_dm from zs_sbf_yjsf t where t.skssswjg_dm = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t.skcllx_dm = '0' and t.yzclrq is null
select t.mxuuid, t.zbuuid, t.zsxm_dm, t.sphm, t.bjskje, t.znj, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgrq, t.xgr_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.zfbz_1 from ZM_DWFHDZSJYCXXHCB_BJSKXX t where t.zbuuid = ? and zfbz_1 = 'N'
select z.mxuuid,z.zspm_dm,z.pzzl_dm,z.wspzzg,z.wspzhm,z.skssqq,z.skssqz,z.sjje,z.kjje from zm_zysglzmmxxx z where z.zyssquuid=? and z.zfbz_1='N'

select t.uuid, t.djxh, t.fybh, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.sqrq, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.dyrq, t.yxbz, t.zfbz_1, t.lcslid, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg, t.pzhm, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.fwsdswjg_dm, t.sjgsdq from zm_yjssswszmxxb t where (1 = #macroparam# or t.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.fybh = ?) and t.sqrq > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.sqrq < = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.zfbz_1 = 'N' and (1 = #macroparam# or t.fwsdswjg_dm in (#macroparam#))
